title: Can we wear clothes with quotes like break the rules? assim al hakeem JAL
transcript: Adrian from Serbia asalam alayum Salam so is it permissible to to wear clothes that h on them for example let your dreams be your wings Break The Rules or mindset is everything as long as what's written on your clothes does not go against Shar does not go against the belief in the Divine decree does not cont redict any Islamic teachings it is permissible but why would any sane person wear something that makes him a billboard yeah if you have an idea you communicate it not wear it especially if it's a long coat or if it's a coat of someone you don't know and Allah Knows Best
